thread.title: Watch the Tearful Trailer for Jill and Jessa Duggar's New TLC Special
thread.title_full: Watch the Tearful Trailer for Jill and Jessa Duggar's New TLC Special

title: Watch the Tearful Trailer for Jill and Jessa Duggar's New TLC Special
text: Watch the Tearful Trailer for Jill and Jessa Duggar's New TLC Special Monday, 19 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) The network has released a trailer for the upcoming special Jill and Jessa: In the trailer, the sisters reflect on how it felt when earlier this year, the news of their brother Josh molesting them and three other girls when he was a teenager broke. TLC canceled 19 Kids and Counting following the news of Josh's scandal, but Jill and Jessa, as well as their mother Michelle appeared in TLC's Breaking the Silence, a special about sexual abuse. In a new teaser for their upcoming TLC special 'Jill and Jessa: Counting On,' the sisters tearfully address their family's recent hardships.
